10014.Introduction:

Trailblazers can receive daily rewards in the Travel Log after logging in to the game each day.

◆ Event Rewards ◆
The rewards will be unlocked in sequential order according to the Trailblazer's accrued login days. Daily rewards will be refreshed at <unbreak>04</unbreak>:<unbreak>00</unbreak> AM (server time) every day.

10015.Name: Trailblazing Will
10015.Introduction:
◆Event Rules◆
Reach corresponding Trailblaze Levels during the event to claim rewards.

◆Event Rewards◆
Total available rewards: Star Rail Pass ×<unbreak>40</unbreak> and Stellar Jade ×<unbreak>1600</unbreak>.

10016.Name: Starkissed Synchrony
10016.Introduction:
◆ Event Rules ◆
Trailblazers can obtain rewards by completing certain missions during the event.

◆ Event Rewards ◆
Complete certain missions or fulfill certain conditions to obtain event rewards. The rewards will be distributed automatically. Trailblazers can also obtain Trailblaze Level Rewards from Pom-Pom after increasing their Trailblaze Level.

10017.Name: Turquoise's Reverie
10017.Introduction:
◆ Event Rules ◆
Clear specific stages to obtain event rewards.

◆ Event Requirement ◆
Unlocked after reaching Trailblaze Level <unbreak>21</unbreak> and completing the mission "Fleeting Lights."

◆ Event Rewards ◆
Clear the Forgotten Hall Memory (III) to obtain the 4-star character Qingque (Erudition: Quantum).

10018.Introduction:

10019.Name: Starlit Homecoming
10019.Introduction:
◆ Rules ◆
During the event, returning Trailblazers can receive "A Gift for Returners" for one time only. Participate in and complete the 7-Day Check-In and the Path of Return events to receive their corresponding rewards. Challenging and passing stages in Calyxes, Caverns of Corrosion, and others during the event will also provide double material drops from Double Rewards.

◆ 7-Day Check-In Rewards ◆
During the event, log into the game every day to receive rewards. The rewards are renewed every day at <unbreak>04</unbreak>:<unbreak>00</unbreak> server time. Daily log-in rewards can only be received once per day. A maximum of 7 days of rewards are provided.

◆ Path of Return Rewards ◆
During the event, complete specific missions to receive mission rewards and "The Returning Trails." Accumulate sufficient "The Returning Trails" to receive rewards at specific milestones. Bonus rewards at each milestone can only be claimed once.

◆ Double Rewards Extra Drops ◆
During the return period, Trailblazers will receive double drops for completing Calyx, Cavern of Corrosion, and Planar Ornament challenges. After the double drops challenges are expended, gain an additional reward atop the original rewards already earned.
※ Should other double-reward events like Garden of Plenty occur at the same time as Starlit Homecoming, the daily double drop for Garden of Plenty and other events will be consumed first when obtaining rewards.

◆ Return Survey ◆
Complete the survey to earn rewards. The rewards will be sent via mail. The survey can only be filled in once. If you have already submitted the survey, you cannot fill in or modify it again.

10020.Name: Garden of Plenty
10020.Description: During the event, challenge Calyx (Golden) and Calyx (Crimson) successfully to receive double rewards.
10020.Introduction:
◆ Event Rules ◆
During the event period, players can receive double rewards by challenging and completing Calyx (Golden) and Calyx (Crimson).
You will get an additional reward on top of default drops after consuming an event double reward opportunity and Trailblaze Power.
The number of daily double reward opportunities is limited. The limits and attempts used so far can be viewed on the Garden of Plenty event page.
Double reward count resets daily at <unbreak>04</unbreak>:<unbreak>00</unbreak> (server time). Please be sure to challenge them in a timely manner. 
If the double reward from both the Starlit Homecoming and Garden of Plenty events are active simultaneously, the Garden of Plenty event count will be prioritized for consumption when claiming rewards that fit the conditions for both events.

◆ Event Rewards ◆
By completing Calyx (Golden) and Calyx (Crimson) and obtaining EXP Materials, credits, and Trace Materials, players will automatically consume an attempt to receive double rewards.

10021.Name: Realm of the Strange
10021.Description: During the event, successfully challenge Caverns of Corrosion to earn double rewards.
10021.Introduction:
◆ Event Rules ◆
During the event, Trailblazers can receive double rewards by challenging and completing Caverns of Corrosion.
You will get an additional reward on top of default drops after consuming an event double reward opportunity and Trailblaze Power.
The number of daily double reward opportunities is limited. The limits and attempts used so far can be viewed on the Realm of the Strange event page.
Double reward count resets daily at <unbreak>04</unbreak>:<unbreak>00</unbreak> (server time). Be sure to challenge them in a timely manner, Trailblazers.

◆ Event Rewards ◆
By completing Caverns of Corrosion and obtaining rewards, Trailblazers will automatically consume one remaining chance to receive the double rewards.

10023.Name: Gift of Odyssey
10023.Introduction:

◆ Event Rewards ◆

10024.Name: Planar Fissure
10024.Description: During the event, successfully challenge Simulated Universe to earn double Planar Ornaments rewards.
10024.Introduction:
◆ Event Rules ◆
During the event, Trailblazers can receive double Planar Ornament rewards via the immersion device by challenging Simulated Universe.
The number of daily double reward opportunities is limited and can be viewed on the Planar Fissure event page.
Double reward count resets daily at <unbreak>04</unbreak>:<unbreak>00</unbreak> (server time). Be sure to use these up in a timely manner, Trailblazers.
◆ Event Rewards ◆
By challenging Simulated Universe and obtaining Planar Ornaments, Trailblazers will automatically consume an event opportunity to receive double rewards.

10025.Name: To Retire Upon the Perch
10025.Description: Complete Trailblaze Mission "A Dragon Gallant, Its Ocean Distant" and clear Forgotten Hall: Memory of Xianzhou Stage 1 to obtain the character Yukong
10025.Introduction:
◆ Event Rules ◆
Clear specific stages to obtain event rewards.

◆ Participation Requirement ◆
Complete the Trailblaze Mission in "Xianzhou Luofu - A Dragon Gallant, Its Ocean Distant" to unlock new memories in the Forgotten Hall, "The Voyage of Navis Astriger."

◆ Event Rewards ◆
Clear "Forgotten Hall: Memory of Xianzhou Stage 1" to obtain the 4-star character Yukong (Harmony: Imaginary).

10026.Name: Planar Fissure
10026.Description: During the event, successfully challenge Simulated Universe or Divergent Universe to earn double Planar Ornaments rewards.
10026.Introduction:

You will get an additional reward on top of default drops after consuming an event double reward opportunity and Trailblaze Power (or Immersifier).
During the event, the number of double reward opportunities is limited and can be viewed on the Planar Fissure event page.
The double reward count will not reset during the event. Be sure to schedule your time for this challenge accordingly, Trailblazers.

◆ Event Rewards ◆
By challenging Simulated Universe and Divergent Universe, Trailblazers will automatically consume one remaining chance to receive the double rewards when they obtain Planar Ornaments.

10043.Name: Come With Me, Take the Journey
10043.TabName: Come With Me, Take the Journey
10043.Description: Dear Trailblazer, your companions aboard the Express are waiting for you to take the journey by their side and re-embark on your cosmic adventure! Earn up to <unbreak>480</unbreak> Stellar Jades!
10043.Introduction:
◆ Event Details ◆
● During the event, Trailblazers can obtain rewards such as Stellar Jades by inviting returning Trailblazers.
● Active Trailblazers can share their unique invitation codes with other eligible Trailblazers to encourage their return. By doing so, Trailblazers can earn Stellar Jade and event draw chances.
● After logging back into the game, returning Trailblazers can also share their invitation codes to invite other eligible Trailblazers to rejoin the game and participate in the web event.
※ There may be a brief delay in updating the status of returning Trailblazers. If so, please wait for 2 minutes and refresh the webpage to check your status again.

◆ Returning Trailblazer ◆
Trailblazers who are eligible for the Starlit Homecoming event are considered returning Trailblazers, and the eligibility requirements are as follows:
● Be at Trailblaze Level <unbreak>10</unbreak> or higher.
● Complete the Trailblaze Mission "Jarilo-VI — Long Wait for the Blade's Edge"
● Has not logged into the game for at least <unbreak>14</unbreak> days in a row
● The last participation in the Starlit Homecoming was at least <unbreak>40</unbreak> days ago.
※ A returning Trailblazer's status shall last for the duration of the Starlit Homecoming event.

10061.Name: Treasures Lightward: High Difficulty
10061.Introduction:
◆ Gameplay Rules ◆
● Treasures Lightward is a new series of permanent game modes with higher difficulty that refreshes periodically, including the Forgotten Hall: Memory of Chaos, Pure Fiction, and Apocalyptic Shadow.
● After completing The Last Vestiges of Towering Citadel: Memory (XV), Forgotten Hall: Memory of Chaos will be unlocked.
● After completing the Adventure Mission "Youci's Clever Decor," Pure Fiction will be unlocked.
● After completing the Adventure Mission "Grim Film of Finality," Apocalyptic Shadow will be unlocked.
● Treasures Lightward will periodically refresh the stage contents and rewards.

◆ Refresh Rules ◆
● Treasures Lightward will update alternatively every two weeks in the following order: Apocalyptic Shadow, Pure Fiction, then Forgotten Hall: Memory of Chaos. Updates occur at <unbreak>04</unbreak>:<unbreak>00</unbreak> on Mondays (server time).
● After the Treasures Lightward game refreshes, the updated mode will remain open for 6 weeks.

10062.Name: Nether Puppet
10062.Description: Complete the mission "Grim Film of Finality" and clear Difficulty <unbreak>02</unbreak> for any phase of Apocalyptic Shadow to unlock the character Xueyi, <unbreak>300</unbreak> Stellar Jades, and 1 Self-Modeling Resin.
10062.Introduction:
◆ Event Rules ◆
● Clear specific stages to obtain event rewards.

◆ Participation Requirement ◆
● Unlocked after completing the Adventure Mission "Grim Film of Finality."

◆ Event Rewards ◆
● Clear Difficulty <unbreak>02</unbreak> for any phase of Apocalyptic Shadow to obtain the 4-star character Xueyi (Destruction: Quantum), <unbreak>300</unbreak> Stellar Jades, and 1 Self-Modeling Resin.

10068.Name: When Charmony Rings Out...
10068.Introduction:
◆ Event Rules ◆

● If you have already activated Trailblazer: Harmony, this will automatically convert to 1 Shadow of Harmony, which can raise Trailblazer: Harmony's Eidolon Level.

10076.Name: Express Gift
10076.Description: The Astral Express has visited countless worlds and made many reliable companions along the way. The Express Crew invites friends, old and new, to fight alongside the Trailblazers. Wishing you a bright future on your trailblazing expedition.
10076.Introduction:

"Himeko," "Welt," "Bronya," "Gepard," "Clara," "Yanqing," "Bailu."

During the character trial event "Aptitude Showcase," Trailblazers can use set teams that include trial characters to repeatedly experience specific stages.

Rewards for the trial stage can be obtained from the event screen after completing the stage. Each trial stage reward may only be claimed once during the event.

◆ Event Rewards ◆
Rewards for the trial stage can be obtained from the event screen after completing the stage. Each trial stage reward may only be claimed once during the event.

30002.Name: Cosmic Warfare
30002.Description: Someone left a mysterious gift at the Herta Space Station, and the person who opened it is now in trouble...
30002.Introduction:
◆ Introduction ◆
Scout out targets, attack them, and try to defeat them. Trailblazers can scout 3 times a day, refreshed daily at 4:<unbreak>00</unbreak> AM server time.
Trailblazers will be awarded Stars of Honor based on their performance during attacks. More Stars of Honor gained means more rewards can be claimed.

◆ Participation Requirements ◆
Trailblaze Level must be <unbreak>22</unbreak> or higher.

◆ Attacks & United Attacks ◆
At least one Pixel Warhead is consumed to launch one attack. Consumed Pixel Warheads will be refreshed daily.
Trailblazers can also launch United Attacks by sharing targets they scouted with Friends and other Trailblazers to obtain assistance.
Assisting other players will grant extra Stars of Honor.

◆ Battle ◆
After launching an attack, Trailblazers will fight 7 Cycles with the target, and the battle will automatically finish at the end of Cycle 7.
Damage dealt to the target per battle are accumulated until the target is completely defeated.
Trailblazers can choose to consume 3 Pixel Warheads to increase the damage towards the target in one battle.

◆ Stars of Honor ◆
Scout out targets, participate in attacks, and defeat targets before they escape to gain Stars of Honor. The Trailblazer who discovered the target will receive extra Stars of Honor.
The more damage one deals to the target and the more dangerous the target is, the more Stars of Honor will be granted.
Completing daily Cosmic Warfare missions also grants Stars of Honor.
Claim battle rewards once sufficient Stars of Honor have been obtained.

◆ Combat History ◆
Trailblazers can review Combat History for each attack to re-live the process taken to defeat the enemy.
For United Attacks, the battle process for other Trailblazers can also be reviewed.

30004.Name: Where Are You, Mystery Trotter?
30004.Description: Where is the Mystery Trotter? Why not consult Regin's homemade sensor at the Goethe Hotel!
30004.Introduction:
◆ Introduction ◆
Where Are You, Mystery Trotter? Why not consult Regin's homemade sensor at the Goethe Hotel!

◆ Event Rules ◆
During the event, the Trailblazer can help Regin conduct sensor experiments to look for Trotters. There are 7 clues for Trotters.

◆ Event Rewards ◆
The Trailblazer will receive rewards after completing the daily Search Missions, and receive bonus rewards after completing all Search Missions.

30006.Name: Stellar Shadowseeker
30006.Description: In your trailblazing expedition, the peculiar and interesting things you encountered were captured by March 7th, but it seems there are some issues with these photos...
30006.Introduction:
◆ Introduction ◆
During the trailblazing expedition, the peculiar sights and interesting events you encountered were captured by March 7th. However, there seems to be some issues with these photos...

◆ Event Rules ◆
During the event, there will be 2 photos covered by dark shadows that need to be re-taken by the Trailblazer each day. The Trailblazer can locate the photo subjects based on the shape of the shadow in the photo. Successfully taking the photo will allow you to claim the corresponding reward.

◆ Event Rewards ◆
Assist March 7th in taking photos to earn rewards.

30007.Name: Space Station Task Force
30007.Description: The space station's post-disaster recovery work can only be entrusted to the special commissioner!
30007.Introduction:
◆ Summary ◆
The post-disaster recovery work of the space station can only be entrusted to the task force!

◆ Event Rules ◆
During the event, Trailblazers can obtain rewards by assigning characters to complete the event assignments. For the first 6 days of the event, 4 assignments will be unlocked every day. A total of <unbreak>24</unbreak> assignments will be given.

◆ Event Rewards ◆
Assign characters to complete event assignments to obtain rewards. Using recommended Paths or high-level characters can improve assignment evaluation and result in bonus rewards.

30008.Name: Critter Pick
30008.Description: Ruan Mei's creations aboard the space station actually developed their own civilization! Asta and Screwllum task you with finding out everything about it...
30008.Introduction:
◆ Introduction ◆
In an unexpected turn of events, Ruan Mei's creations in the seclusion zone have spontaneously developed their own social civilization! Intrigued by this phenomenon, Asta has entrusted you with the task of investigating the nurturing principles. She and Screwllum have even prepared a "Lifeform Oven" and a "Helper Robot" for you...

◆ Event Rules ◆
● During the Critter Pick event, Trailblazers can nurture their own desired creations via combination and pairing.
● Mutations may occur during the nurturing process, leading to new creation traits or even rare creations.
● Basic creation traits can be obtained from completing the Adventure Mission "Critter Pick" and exploring the Seclusion Zone.

◆ Regular Rewards ◆
● You can raise your Research Level via a variety of means, such as obtaining new creation traits and nurturing rare creations.
● Raising your Research Level earns you the corresponding rewards.

◆ Limited-Time Rewards ◆
● During the limited-time event, you can fulfill nurturing targets and earn the corresponding rewards.

◆ Event Notes ◆
Once the limited-time event "Critter Pick" has concluded, Trailblazers can no longer obtain the limited-time rewards. However, they can still participate in this feature through the Lifeform Oven in the seclusion zone and obtain regular rewards at any time.

30010.Name: Dreamchaser Bulletin
30010.Description: On your way to Penacony, you receive a tabloid in your inbox. It may be worth examining to see if there is any noteworthy news.
30010.Introduction:
◆ Introduction ◆
On your way to Penacony, you receive a tabloid in your inbox. It may be worth examining to see if there is any noteworthy news.

◆ Event Rules ◆
During the event, Trailblazers will have access to all news pieces on the page.
Trailblazers will receive rewards by completing the required news pieces in Penacony.

◆ Event Rewards ◆
Rewards for each news piece can only be obtained once.

30011.Name: Mr. Cold Feet's Pop-Up Shop
30011.Description: Sampo seems to be preparing for some new business venture in Belobog. Should we check it out?
30011.Introduction:
◆ Introduction ◆
● Utilizing a certain cosmic e-commerce platform, Sampo has begun preparation for a new business venture on Belobog...

◆ Event Rules ◆
● During the event, Sampo will release 1 piece of e-commerce merchandise and a required component each day, totaling seven different merchandise items.
● Trailblazers can collect and submit the components to receive the daily e-commerce merchandise and rewards.

◆ Event Rewards ◆
● During the event, submit the required components and complete the mission to obtain Stellar Jades and Limited-Time Event rewards.

30012.Name: Shadow of the Ranger
30012.Description: A space station researcher has requested your aid in uncovering Boothill's whereabouts. The clues are nigh impossible to unravel, and the mysteries behind the Galaxy Ranger are ceaseless.
30012.Introduction:
◆ Introduction ◆
● A space station researcher has taken the initiative to take an IPC contract and send the commission to you. After confirming the researcher isn't trying to skim you for easy profits, you discover many people are actively trying to discover Boothill's whereabouts...

◆ Event Rules ◆
● When the event begins, <unbreak>24</unbreak> assignments will be released. Up to 4 assignments can be accepted by the Trailblazer at a time.
● Each assignment requires at least two characters to complete. Assignments will be given ratings in the following descending order: S, A, or B. Using recommended Paths or higher-level characters can increase the assignment's rating and earn bonus rewards.
● Event Assignments do not count toward the limit for the Regular Assignments, nor do they occupy characters from Regular Assignments. You can assign 1 Support Character provided by your friends to each Event Assignment.

◆ Event Rewards ◆
● During the event, assigning characters to commissions can obtain Stellar Jades and Limited-Time Event rewards.

30013.Name: Illia Travelogue
30013.Description: Legend has it that Illia, the Chrysos Heir, spent his entire life wandering Amphoreus and his personal letters were eventually discovered by a wandering bard, thus giving rise to this travelogue.
30013.Introduction:
◆ Introduction ◆
Legend has it that Illia, the Chrysos Heir, spent his entire life wandering Amphoreus and his personal letters were eventually discovered by a wandering bard, thus giving rise to this travelogue.

◆ Event Rules ◆
During the event, Trailblazers will have access to all travel notes on the page.
After Trailblazers will receive rewards from the corresponding page after completing goals relating to Amphoreus' travel notes.

◆ Event Rewards ◆
Completion rewards of any type can only be obtained once during the event period.

30014.Name: Holy City Appraisals
30014.Description: Recently, the Okhema Market has been flooded with fake antiques. The antique shop owner desperately needs an apprentice to help authenticate items...
30014.Introduction:
◆ Introduction ◆
● The Okhema Market has been flooded with fake antiques lately. Theodoros, the antique shop owner, is desperately seeking an apprentice to help authenticate items...

◆ Event Rules ◆
● During the event, Theodoros will release 1 Treasure Pending Appraisal and its required Appraisal Consumables each day, totaling 7 different treasures.
● Trailblazers can submit the Appraisal Consumables required for today to receive the daily rewards for helping with appraisals.

◆ Event Rewards ◆
● During the event, submit the required components and complete the mission to obtain Stellar Jades and Limited-Time Event rewards.

40001.Name: Stellar Flare
40001.Introduction:
◆ Introduction ◆
A researcher from the space station found a combat simulation program of unknown origins called Stellar Flare. Running it can take the user into a simulated battleground, where you can practice warfare against different opponents.
There are special combat rules within the simulation. Familiarize yourself with them and build strategies for a smooth victory.

◆ Event Rules ◆
After the event starts, a new challenge stage will be unlocked each day, for a total of 8 stages.
Each stage has 3 difficulties: Dwarf Star, Giant Star, and Supergiant Star, with ascending enemy strength and different gameplay. The Trailblazer can challenge the Giant Star difficulty straight away, and the Supergiant Star difficulty will be unlocked after completing the Giant Star difficulty.
The levels of enemies and any trial characters will be determined by the Trailblazer's current Equilibrium Level upon initiating the event for the first time. These levels will not be changed if your Equilibrium Level increases during the event.

◆ Event Rewards ◆
Complete a stage to claim its prize from the event screen. Completing higher difficulties will automatically grant rewards for the lower difficulties.
The Trailblazer can obtain Challenge Rewards after eliminating enemies in the third wave and sixth wave respectively in the Supergiant Star difficulty.

40002.Name: Tales of the Fantastic
40002.Description: The crisis on the Luofu has subsided, and stories of the feats of the Nameless can be heard on every street corner of the Luofu. The storyteller, Mr. Xiyan of Starskiff Haven, seems to be interested in your adventure and wants to retell it in story form...
40002.Introduction: ◆ Introduction ◆ Many on the Xianzhou are already speaking of the feats of the Nameless. The Xianzhou's storyteller also hopes the Trailblazer can help him to retell the stories of their trailblazing adventure. ◆ Event Rules ◆ ● After the event starts, a new Hero's Journey will be unlocked every day, for a total of 3 Hero's Journeys. Upon completion of each Journey, some "Legends Past and Present" combat challenge will be unlocked. ● During the event, once Trailblazers complete a Hero's Journey, they will receive a Protagonist Model and gradually improve the abilities within it. These abilities can help to form a more riveting experience in Legends Past and Present. ● The Protagonist Model can provide various Plot Armor combinations that can be freely adjusted, and their effects will be active in Legends Past and Present. ● Good combinations of Plot Armor in the Protagonist Model will result in higher combat scores. ● Trailblazers can use trial characters in Legends Past and Present. ● During combat, enemies will continuously appear for a limited number of Cycles. Points will be awarded for dealing damage to and defeating enemies. At the end of each battle, the highest score will be updated based on the results of the current challenge. ● Raising the Equilibrium Level will also raise the enemy and trial character levels in the event. ◆ Event Rewards ◆ During the event, Trailblazers can claim challenge rewards from the Rewards Catalog after reaching certain scores in Legends Past and Present. When at least 10,000 points have been scored for each Legends Past and Present, a new section of the Readable Legend of the Trailblazer will be unlocked that corresponds to this particular Legend Past and Present. The main characters in the Readable will change depending on the characters used by the Trailblazer in combat. After unlocking all sections of the Readable, Trailblazers can obtain the limited item "Legend of the Trailblazer," which can be viewed at any time from the Mission Item panel in your Inventory. This limited item can only be obtained from this event.

40003.Name: Boulder Town Super League
40003.Introduction:
◆ Introduction ◆
Boulder Town Martial Exhibition has kicked off in the Fight Club — Get in touch with Dr. Dig for more details.

◆ Gameplay Rules ◆
In the Martial Exhibition, Trailblazers can participate in different events to win corresponding rewards.
Upon selecting an event to participate in, Trailblazers will obtain the core martialism of the current school. After defeating the opponent, they can choose one of the two types of enhanced martialism for the current school.
After the battle begins, the team lineup will be locked, and Trailblazers cannot switch out characters. At the start of each battle, all characters' HP and Energy will be reset.
At the start of every battle, all characters' HP and Energy will be reset.
When Trailblazers increase their Equilibrium Level, the enemy's strength will also increase accordingly.
If the number of challenge cycles is no more than 5, a perfect knockout rating will be achieved.
Upon completing all challenges, players will receive a mysterious prize from Dr. Dig.
The minimum number of cycles for each battle in the tournament is 1.

40004.Name: Virtual Scentventure
40004.Description: The Department of Ecology's "Unknown Lifeform Smell-Induced Perceptions and Hallucinations" special test has begun. You have been specially invited as a qualified tester...
40004.Introduction:
◆ Summary ◆
The Department of Ecology is spinning far too many plates: On the eve of the geniuses arriving, they started dedicated testing for the "Unknown Lifeform Smell-Induced Perceptions and Hallucinations" project, during which special scent plug-ins can be activated to trigger a change in perception, causing illusions to be seen. You have been commissioned to assist in this test. Please assist the Department of Ecology in gathering critical data by boldly facing down and defeating these illusions.

◆ Event Note ◆
● Once the event begins, Virtual Scentventure (Normal Mode) is unlocked first. Clear all stages in Normal Mode and talk to Cloudbot to unlock Despair Mode stages.
● Trailblazers cannot claim limited-time awards after limited-time events are finished. 

◆ Virtual Scentventure ◆
● Illusions simulated from scent stimulation are different from normal boss enemies. Please familiar yourself with their special traits prior to entering combat. 
● Unlock the next challenge by reaching a certain score.
● Normal Mode enemies scale with difficulty based on your Equilibrium Level. Despair Mode enemy levels are fixed.
● Use different scent plug-ins during the event to gain different ability bonuses in combat.

40005.Name: Dreamjolt TV
40005.Description: The signal of the Penacony TV Station has been hijacked by an unknown party, resulting in the airing of peculiar programs. Intrigued by what these rogue programs are, you decide to uncover the truth behind it all...
40005.Introduction:
◆ Overview ◆
Some screens in Penacony suddenly started to air strange programs. Uma, a presenter from the TV station, wants to chat about this incident with you. Who knows what kind of secretive stories are hidden behind it...

◆ Event Rules ◆
● There are 5 TV screens with their signals hijacked in this event. Trailblazers need to find the corresponding TV screens on different maps and defeat the mastermind after entering battle.
● The 5 combat stages will be unlocked daily, and the fifth stage will only be unlocked after you have scored in the first four stages.
● When Trailblazers increase their Equilibrium Level, the enemies will increase in power correspondingly.
● Trailblazers can select trial characters to participate in the challenge.

◆ The Big Four TV channels ◆
● There are four major TV channels in Penacony TV Station (corresponding to stages 1–4). Each stage features a key enemy that possesses a Mutation Mechanic.
● Targeting the enemy's Mutation Mechanic is an efficient way to defeat the enemy. Triggering Mutation Mechanic in combat can raise your Stage Buff rank.
● Stage Buff rank means cumulative buffs that can be gained within stages. Accumulating a higher Stage Buff rank will increase characters' combat prowess.
● Stages 1–4 are composed of 2 phases, Buff Buildup and Final Showdown.
● In the Buff Buildup phase, there is a countdown of 4 Cycles where the enemies will continuously refresh. In this phase, you need to exploit key enemies' Mutation Mechanic to raise the Stage Buff rank as much as possible.
● In the Final Showdown phase, the Stage Buff rank can no longer be increased. Defeat as many waves of enemies as possible within 6 Cycles to receive a higher score. If you have leftover Cycles when you pass the stage, you will receive extra scores.

◆ Live Studio ◆
● Live Studio is stage 5, the final boss fight. You can inherit the highest Stage Buff rank you've historically obtained in each of the previous stages (1–4).
● Before you enter the stage, select any 2 accumulated Stage Buff from stages 1–4 and use them for the final boss fight.
● Defeat as many waves of enemies as possible within 6 Cycles to receive a higher score. If you have leftover Cycles when you pass the stage, you will receive extra scores.

◆ Event Rewards ◆
● During the event, you can claim stage rewards from Limited-Time rewards by raising Stage Buff to specific ranks in the stage and by obtaining specific stage scores.
● Challenge all stages and obtain specific scores to receive the Dreamjolt Prize.

40006.Name: Enscrolled Crepusculum
40006.Description: A lost child has appeared in the bustling market of Okhema. She glances around, seemingly trying to find something...
40006.Introduction:
◆ Introduction ◆
A lost child has appeared in the bustling market of Okhema. She glances around, seemingly trying to find something. The warm-hearted Trailblazer will need to find the scattered scrolls and uncover the lost history of the city based on the child's clues...

◆ Event Rules ◆
● There are 5 scrolls in this event. Trailblazers need to find the corresponding scrolls on different maps and defeat the storyline adversaries in battle.
● The 5 combat stages will be unlocked daily, and the fifth stage will only be unlocked after you have scored in the first four stages.
● When Trailblazers increase their Equilibrium Level, the enemies will increase in power correspondingly.
● Trailblazers can select trial characters to participate in the challenge.
● The Energy allied targets regenerate when defeating enemy targets is <unbreak>50%</unbreak> compared to regular battles in the "Enscrolled Crepusculum" game mode.

◆ Scattered Scrolls ◆
● There are four scrolls in total scattered over the city (corresponding to Stage 1 - 4). Each stage has a key type of enemy. This enemy possesses Mutation Mechanic in the stage.
● Challenge the enemy based on its Mutation Mechanic is the way to rapidly defeat them. You can increase your Stage Buff rank after triggering Mutation Mechanic in battle.
●Stage Buff rank is a buff that can be accumulated in the stage. Accumulate higher Stage Buff rank to increase characters' combat capacities.
● Stages 1 to 4 all comprise Buff Buildup and Final Showdown phases.
● The Buff Buildup phase has a countdown of 3 Cycles. Enemies will continuously refresh. In this phase, you need to use the key enemy's Mutation Mechanic to increase Stage Buff rank as much as possible.
● In the Final Showdown phase, Stage Buff ranks can no longer be increased. Defeat more enemy waves in 4 Cycles to get a higher score. If you have leftover Cycles when you finish the stage, you will receive extra Points. If you retreat in this phase, the Stage Buff rank gain in this stage will also be recorded.
● When the Final Showdown phase begins, all allies' Ultimates will immediately be activated.

◆ Titan's Challenge ◆
● Titan's Challenge is stage 5, the final boss fight. You can inherit the highest Stage Buff rank you've historically obtained in each of the previous stages (1–4).
● Before you enter the stage, select any 2 accumulated Stage Buff from stages 1–4 and use them for the final boss fight.
● Defeat as many waves of enemies as possible within 4 Cycles to receive a higher score. If you have leftover Cycles when you pass the stage, you will receive extra Points.

◆ Event Rewards ◆
● During the event, you can claim stage rewards from Limited-Time rewards by raising Stage Buff to specific ranks in the stage and by obtaining specific stage scores.
● Challenge all stages and obtain designated scores to receive Time's Bounty.

50000.Name: Boulder Town Super League
50000.Introduction:
◆ Introduction ◆
Boulder Town Super League has kicked off in the Fight Club — Get in touch with Dr. Dig for more details.

◆ Event Rules ◆
The Trailblazer can participate in different tournaments to obtain the corresponding rewards in the Boulder Town Super League.
After selecting a tournament, the Trailblazer will fight randomly selected opponents and gain different buffs after defeating them.
After random selection begins, your team lineup will be locked, and characters in the team cannot be swapped.
At the start of every battle, all characters' HP and Energy will be reset.
When the Trailblazer increases their Equilibrium Level, enemy strength in the event will increase with it.

◆ Event Rewards ◆
Complete the Time-Limited Challenge during the event to obtain bonus rewards. 

◆ Event Note ◆
After the Boulder Town Super League limited-time event ends, Trailblazers can no longer claim the limited-time event rewards. But it will still be possible to go to the Fight Club and take part in tournaments.

50002.Name: Everwinter City Museum\nLedger of Curiosities
50002.TabName: Everwinter City Museum Ledger of Curiosities
50002.Introduction:
◆ Summary ◆
The Belobog History and Culture Museum has been fully renovated, and the Trailblazer will serve as the acting curator to lead the management and development of the museum, aiming to restore its popularity.

◆ Museum Management ◆
● Once this gameplay is unlocked, the "Opportunity Makes the Thief" Adventure Mission series will become available. Completing "Opportunity Makes the Thief Part 1" will allow Trailblazers to start managing the museum.
● There are five phases of museum management, and RevitaScore can be obtained through management. After achieving the cumulative objectives of each phase, Trailblazers can upgrade to the next phase and unlock new exhibition areas.
● During the day of operation, RevitaScore can be obtained by spending development fund to upgrade exhibition areas or by hiring assistants.

◆ Collection of Exhibits and Assistants ◆
● During museum management, Trailblazers will receive additional operational objectives or encounter random events. These objectives and events will provide clues to lost exhibits, which can be stored in the museum's collection.
● Guest assistants can be recruited by completing the "Opportunity Makes the Thief" Adventure Mission series or the guide recruitment mission series in random events.

◆ Event Rewards ◆
● Completion of each management phase will result in a management phase reward.
● Trailblazers can receive collection rewards in the Ledger of Curiosities after collecting new exhibits or after guest assistants are recruited.
● During the limited-time event, Trailblazers can receive rewards in the Limited-Time Rewards section by achieving operational and collection objectives.

◆ Event Reminder ◆
After the Everwinter City Museum Ledger of Curiosities limited-time event ends, Trailblazers will no longer be able to receive limited-time rewards from the event. However, it'll still be possible to visit the Belobog Administrative District's History and Culture Museum to experience the event.

50003.Name: Aurum Alley's Hustle and Bustle
50003.Description: The decaying Aurum Alley has now found a chance for revitalization — It can either be funded and rebuilt by the IPC, or be led back to prosperity by the local merchant guild. And now, you are in a position to influence its decision...
50003.Introduction:
◆ Introduction ◆
The declining Aurum Alley has now found a chance for revitalization — It can either be funded and rebuilt by the Interastral Peace Corporation, or be led back to prosperity by the local merchant guild. And now, you are in a position to influence its decision...

◆ Event Note ◆
● After the event starts, a new series of Adventure Missions, "Back in Business," will become available. Complete Back in Business (I) to begin Aurum Alley Operations. There are a total of 4 phases.
● After the limited-time event, Aurum Alley's Hustle and Bustle, is over, Trailblazers will be unable to claim the event's limited-time rewards. However, Trailblazers can still access Aurum Alley's Hustle and Bustle to obtain Regular Rewards.

◆ Aurum Alley Operations ◆
● During Aurum Alley Operations, earn "Merchant Guild's funds" to help the merchant guild solve the crisis. After achieving the Merchant Guild's funding goal of each phase and delivering it to the merchant guild, the subsequent mission storyline will be triggered and the landscape of Aurum Alley will change.
● During the operations period, you can also complete "Merchant Events" to establish collaborative relationships with stores. After which, you can advance the operations process and alter the store's landscape. Some stores, after establishing collaborations, will provide goods that can be sold.
● After advancing Aurum Alley's Operations Phase, more Merchant Events will be unlocked.

◆ Inventory Arrangement ◆
● During Aurum Alley's operations period, you can earn Merchant Guild's funds via Inventory Arrangement.
● After completing Merchant Events, you can add new orders and goods for Inventory Arrangement.
● After achieving Aurum Alley's Phase Goal, you will unlock the "Custom Order" of each store as a gameplay challenge.
● After advancing Aurum Alley's Operations Phase, a larger-capacity freight starskiff will become available, allowing for larger shipping revenue.

◆ Logistics Planning ◆
● During Aurum Alley Operations, you can plan routes in "Logistics Planning" and obtain corresponding rewards by achieving certain logistic score.
● After completing Merchant Events, you can unlock the corresponding stores in Logistics Planning and plan the logistics route from the store to the dock.
● After achieving Aurum Alley's Phase Goal, there will be "Streetside Events." Complete them to obtain rewards and unlock the route advantages in Logistics Planning.
● After advancing Aurum Alley's Operations Phase, the Low-Level, Mid-Level, and High-Level logistics lanes will be opened in order to accommodate more stores.

◆ Regular Rewards ◆
● Obtain Prosperity Certificates through Logistics Planning, Merchant Events, Street Events, and Custom Orders.
● Exchange Prosperity Certificates for rewards via Guild Benefits.

◆ Limited-Time Rewards ◆
● During the limited-time activity period, if you complete gameplays such as Inventory Arrangement and Logistics Planning, you can claim Logistics Planning Rewards from the Limited-Time Rewards.
● During the limited-time activity period, if you complete events such as Merchant Events and Streetside Events, you can claim Revitalization Progress Rewards from the Limited-Time Rewards.

50004.Name: Underground Treasure Hunt
50004.Introduction:
◆ Introduction ◆
In Belobog, the ancient ruins from before the Eternal Freeze are once again seeing the light of day. Rare treasures and ancient relics are buried in the depths, waiting to be uncovered by adventurers...

◆ Event Rules ◆
● After the event starts, a new ruin will be unlocked every day, with a total of 5 ruins.
● During the event, treasure hunters can explore various areas of the ruins by consuming stamina. There are items, supplies, and even dangerous enemies lurking in the ruins, waiting to be found by treasure hunters.
● Planning your route and stamina use carefully, being resourceful with items unearthed in the ruins, and preparing to deal with a variety of enemies will make for a smoother treasure hunting expedition.
● Trailblazers can use trial characters in this event.
● The HP and Energy of all characters will be recorded at the end of each battle.
● Raising the Equilibrium Level will also raise the enemy and trial character levels in the event.

◆ Event Rewards ◆
Explore the ruins during the event and claim Treasure Hunt Rewards after reaching a certain level of exploration progress.

50005.Name: Aetherium Wars
50005.Description: The popular game, Aetherium Wars, is currently holding the "Interastral Tournament Festival," where players are all set to show their strength...
50005.Introduction:
◆ Introduction ◆
 Developed by the Interastral Peace Corporation, "Aetherium Wars" is a trading card battle game that uses "Aether Coins" as its medium, and has taken the universe by storm since its release. In this game, any organism's data can be transformed into "Aether Spirits" for players to "collect, battle, train, and upgrade." Currently, the IPC has decided to organize an "Interastral Tournament Festival" in Belobog, where Aetherium Wars players from all over the universe will compete for the title of "Champion."

◆ Event Rules ◆
● The event will adopt special battle rules, and the Trailblazers will have to fight opponents using Aether Spirits.
● The goal of the event is to win the title of Champion in the Interastral Tournament Festival. Trailblazers will need to pass the trials of each of the four "Victory Zones" one by one and defeat the "championship contender" to earn "Mastery Marks." Collecting four Mastery Marks will qualify you to enter the tournament.
● In the event's Challenge Mode, "Hyperlink Match," Trailblazers can face off against other players in the universe in an Aether Spirit match, and see who from your past journeys you will come across.
● During the challenge, you can meet various players and Aether Spirits, and strengthen your Aether Spirit team by collecting, battling, training, and upgrading them.

◆ Rewards ◆
● In the Aetherium Wars event, you can increase your "Victory Rating" by challenging Victory Zones and Hyperlink Matches, and you can receive rating rewards after reaching different Victory Ratings.
● Achieve the set event goals during the limited-time event to claim the event rewards from "Limited-Time Rewards."

◆ Event Tips ◆
● After the Aetherium Wars event has concluded, Trailblazers will not be able to claim the limited-time event rewards. However, you can still visit the Old Weapon Testing Ground in Belobog to experience the event's contents.

50006.Name: A Foxian Tale of the Haunted
50006.TabName: A Foxian Tale of the Haunted
50006.Description: With the Creation Furnace having burst apart, the heliobi sealed within have gone loose. The Ten-Lords Commission is commanded to eradicate these demons, and you are about to experience an otherworldly tale with the judges.
50006.Introduction:
◆ Introduction ◆
With the Creation Furnace having burst apart, the heliobi sealed within have gone loose. The Ten-Lords Commission is commanded to eradicate these demons, and you are about to experience an otherworldly tale with the judges.

◆ Participation Requirements ◆
● After the Trailblazer has completed "Sojourners' Ghastly Reverie," the event will become available. The Trailblazer can undertake investigative assignments in the "Ghostly Grove" and participate in stage challenges in the "Exorcismal Chronicle."
● After the limited-time event "A Foxian Tale of the Haunted" concludes, Trailblazers will no longer be able to obtain the time-limited rewards from the event. However, you can still play through the storylines of "A Foxian Tale of the Haunted" and visit Fyxestroll Garden in the Xianzhou Luofu to partake in the Ghostly Grove and Exorcismal Chronicle, and claim regular rewards.

◆ Ghostly Grove ◆
● Trailblazers jointly manage the "LilGuiGuinevere" influencer account with the Ghost-Hunting Squad in Ghostly Grove, increasing the account's popularity level through gaining fans.
● In Ghostly Grove, Trailblazers can take on investigative missions. Upon completing these missions, they can edit and publish "Ghost-Hunting Squad" posts to attract comments from netizens, gain fans, and receive gratuity points.
● Accumulating fans enhances the account's popularity phase in Ghostly Grove. Advancing to new popularity phases unlocks new Foxian Tale of the Haunted Trailblaze Continuance stories, the completion of which will unlock more investigative missions.
● In addition to accepting investigative missions, Trailblazers can also reply to comments from netizens on Ghostly Grove and earn gratuity points.

◆ Exorcismal Chronicle ◆
● Completing the Trailblaze Continuance "A Foxian Tale of the Haunted" will unlock various Suppression Towers in Fyxestroll Garden, along with their associated challenges in the Exorcismal Chronicle. Each Suppression Tower consists of stages with four difficulty levels.
● Clearing stages in the Exorcismal Chronicle yields gratuity points. By cumulative completion of challenges in these stages, you can obtain rewards in Exorcism Rewards.
● After completing "Foxian Dream," the "Begone, Evil" becomes accessible in the Exorcismal Chronicle. This includes four "Warring Expedition" stages, each of which will only unlock after completing all difficulty levels of Exorcismal Chronicle stages in the Suppression Tower.
● All challenges in the Exorcismal Chronicle require the use of Exorcismics obtained in "A Foxian Tale of the Haunted."

◆ Regular Rewards ◆
● Completing investigative missions in Ghostly Grove and stages in the Exorcismal Chronicle will earn gratuity points.
● Submit gratuity points in the "Subscription Plan" system to elevate your subscription level and claim subscription rewards.

◆ Limited-Time Rewards ◆
● During the Limited-Time Event, complete Sojourners' Ghastly Reverie to receive a reward Light Cone, and elevate your popularity in Ghostly Grove to receive Light Cone Superimposition material rewards.
● During the Limited-Time Event, you can claim rewards from Limited-Time Rewards by completing investigation missions in Ghostly Grove, completing challenges in Exorcismal Chronicle, and the gameplays in Fyxestroll Garden map.

50007.Name: Hanu's Prison Break
50007.Description: Dr. Edward has created a new dream bubble with a unique theme, receiving rave reviews from customers who have experienced it. What makes it so exciting? Talk to Dr. Edward and try it yourself.
50007.Introduction:
◆ Introduction ◆
Dr. Edward has created a new dream bubble with a unique theme, receiving rave reviews from customers who have experienced it. What makes it so exciting? Talk to Dr. Edward and try it yourself.

◆ Event Rules ◆
● After the event starts, the "Bubble Pinball" stage in the Shallow Dreamscape will unlock. Completing the dream bubble stage unlocks the next one.
● Once you have completed the dream bubbles in the Shallow Dreamscape, new dream bubble chapters in the Deep Dreamscape will unlock.
● Among them, Bubble Pinball contain 5 stages, Dream Ticker contains 5 stages, Hanu's Adventure contains 2 stages, and Dreamwalker contains 2 stages.

◆ Event Rewards ◆
● If you achieve the specified event objective during the limited-time event, you're entitled to claim 1 character reward in the "Character Selection" section.
● If you achieve the specified event objective during the limited-time event, you're entitled to claim event rewards in the "Limited-Time Rewards" section.
● After this event ends, Trailblazers will no longer be able to claim limited-time event rewards. However, they can still visit Dr. Edward to experience the event content and claim regular rewards.

50008.Name: Cosmodyssey
50008.Description: The Astral Express received a package from a Nameless. Pom-Pom is waiting for you to return to the Express to open it together and see what's inside...
50008.Introduction:
◆ Introduction ◆
The Astral Express received a package from a Nameless. Pom-Pom is waiting for you to return to the Express to open it together and see what's inside...

◆ Event Goal ◆
● Trailblazers need to continuously acquire "Trailblaze Funds" to unlock server-wide rewards and personal rewards.
● During the event, continuously contribute Trailblaze Funds to accumulate Individual Contribution and unlock corresponding rewards.
● Individual Contribution will also boost Cosmic Contribution Progress. When Cosmic Contribution Progress reaches specific milestones, you will unlock milestone rewards.

◆ Event Rules ◆
● Login daily to earn dice. Rolling dice allows players to advance on the map and earn Trailblaze Funds through various gameplay modes. When the dice are depleted, Trailblazers can contribute the accumulated Trailblaze Funds.
● Once the Cosmic Contribution Progress reaches <unbreak>100%</unbreak>, there will be no limit on the number of dice players can use.

◆ Trailblaze Affinity Test ◆
● Trailblazers can experience the test gameplay during the event.
● By completing a certain number of test questions, Trailblazers will unlock a test report and receive corresponding rewards.

◆ Event Tips ◆
● If no contribution is made on a given day, the Trailblaze Funds will be automatically contributed the next time you enter the event.

50009.Name: Vignettes in a Cup
50009.Description: The manager of the Dreamjolt Hostelry is away and has entrusted you to take over the role of the drinksmith. However, the patrons of the lounge are not ordinary customers...
50009.Introduction:
◆ Introduction ◆
The manager of the Dreamjolt Hostelry is away and has entrusted you to take over the role of the drinksmith. However, the patrons of the lounge are not ordinary customers...

◆ Event Rules ◆
● In the Vignettes in a Cup event, the Trailblazer will play the role of the drinksmith, conversing with members of the Dreamjolt Troupe and crafting drinks that meet their needs to gain their trust and address their emotional troubles.

◆ Permanent Rewards ◆
● After serving customers, you will receive Tips. If you meet their needs, you will receive extra Tips.
● Tips can be exchanged for rewards in the Revenue Statistics.

◆ Limited-time Rewards ◆
● During the limited-time event, completing specified missions will earn you corresponding rewards.

◆ Event Reminders ◆
After the Vignettes in a Cup limited-time event ends, Trailblazers will no longer be able to obtain the limited-time rewards, but they can still visit the Drink Lounge in the Dreamjolt Hostelry map to experience and obtain permanent rewards.

50010.Name: Tides of War
50010.Description: A researcher from the Maintenance Department unexpectedly made a fighting game inside the Memory Bubble. He invites you to come and play...
50010.Introduction:
◆ Introduction ◆
A researcher from the Maintenance Department is apparently your "fanboy." He used Memory Bubbles to recreate his favorite childhood game. He specifically asked someone to invite you to play it, even preparing a "Support Function" for you. This really is too kind to refuse...

◆ Event Rules ◆
● In this event, 6 combat stages will be unlocked one by one.
● In combat, you must defeat 3 waves of Boss Enemies within 6 Cycles. Non-boss enemies will also constantly appear.
● A higher rating can be achieved if there are Cycles remaining when a stage is cleared.
● When an ally defeats an enemy, the Energy regenerated is only <unbreak>50%</unbreak> of what would be generated in regular combat.
● Trailblazers can select trial characters to take part in the challenge.
When the Trailblazer increases their Equilibrium Level, enemies will correspondingly increase in strength.

◆ Gameplay Overview ◆
● Each stage has its own Grit Mechanics. Trigger it to quickly accumulate and increase Grit Value, elevate your Grit Phase, and obtain more buffs.
● After entering "Grit Phase 4: Power Awoken," you will obtain powerful Stage Buffs to defeat enemies!

◆ Grit Value ◆
● Grit Value is accumulated each time Grit Mechanics are triggered during battle.
● Characters can accumulate a small amount of Grit Value each time they take action.
● Once your Grit Value reaches the target value, you can elevate your Grit Phase.
● The amount of Grit Value required to elevate your Grit Phase in each stage is different. You can check it in the stage.

◆ Grit Phase ◆
● There are 4 Grit Phases. Every time you reach the next phase, you can activate an additional Support Function to obtain more Stage Buffs.
● Enter "Grit Phase 4: Power Awoken" to gain powerful buffs. The Support Function active in this phase is the core buff for this stage and is added by default and cannot be selected.
● For each stage, the Support Functions in Grit Phase 2 and Grit Phase 3 need to be selected before entering battle.
● "Grit Phase 4: Power Awoken" will end within a certain amount of action value. And when it ends, combat will return to Grit Phase 3.
● During "Grit Phase 4: Power Awoken," each attack against an enemy accumulates Waken Attacks. Based on the number of Waken Attacks accumulated, a certain amount of Grit Value will be returned when you return to Grit Phase 3, helping you to quickly re-enter "Grit Phase 4: Power Awoken".

◆ Event Rewards ◆
● During the event, elevate Grit Phase to the target level in the stage and defeat the stage boss to claim stage rewards from "Limited-Time Rewards."
● Challenge all stages and defeat the first wave's boss enemy in all stages to claim the offering.

50011.Name: The Legend of\nGalactic Baseballer
50011.Description: Giovanni has invited you to test a game based on you. Defeat enemies from across the universe, synthesize the most powerful weapons in the cosmos, and ascend to the pinnacle of being the "Galactic Baseballer"!
50011.Introduction:
◆ Introduction ◆
Giovanni has invited you to test a game based on you. Defeat enemies from across the universe, synthesize the most powerful weapons in the cosmos, and ascend to the pinnacle of being the "Galactic Baseballer"!

◆ Event Rules ◆
● This event is made up of six stages in total with three difficulties. Each stage is made up of three combat phases.
● Trailblazers need to defeat a specified number of enemies during the three combat phases within a limited number of cycles to complete the challenge.
● Once the event starts, a specific score must be achieved in the prerequisite stage to unlock subsequent stages.
● When Trailblazers increase their Equilibrium Level, the enemies will increase in power accordingly.
● Trailblazers can select trial characters to participate in the challenge.
● When defeating enemies in "The Legend of Galactic Baseballer," the amount of Energy characters regenerate is only <unbreak>50%</unbreak> of what they normally would in regular battles.

◆ Gameplay Overview ◆
● Defeat enemies in the stage to gain experience and increase your Team Level.
● Each stage has a different Team Bonus effect. When the Team Level increases, allies will obtain level-based Stage Buff according to the current stage's Team Bonus effect.
● When your Team Level increases, you can choose a random "Weapon" or "Accessory." When you get a Weapon or Accessory that you already possess, you can increase their level to obtain stronger effects.
● Weapons can autonomously take action or be triggered by allies to deal DMG to enemies. Meanwhile, Accessories can provide various buffs for Weapons and allies.
● Every Weapon has a specific resonant Accessory. When you have a max level Weapon and its resonant Accessory, you can ascend them to a powerful Legendary Weapon when leveling later.
● Enemies in the stages will grow stronger with each wave and phase. Trailblazers can defeat these increasingly powerful enemies by strategically combining Weapons and Accessories and increasing weapon levels to obtain Legendary weapons.

◆ Stage Gameplay ◆
● In each stage, there are multiple waves of enemies spanning three phases. Each phase concludes with either an elite or boss enemy challenge.
● Each wave features a specific number of enemies, which will continuously respawn until all enemies in that wave are defeated.
● In each wave of battle, there is a countdown of finite Cycles. When the countdown reaches zero, any remaining enemies will disappear, and you won't be able to earn points or experience from them anymore.
● In the elite wave of each phase, there are specific clearance objectives that require defeating a designated number of elite enemies before you can progress to the next phase of combat.
● Defeat more enemies and deal higher damage to the final boss to earn a higher score. If there are any Cycles remaining when you clear the stage, you can earn extra points.
● After the completion of each phase of battle, your current Team Level, acquired Weapons, Accessories, and other data will be automatically saved. You can use the saved data to resume your challenge at the current stage after exiting for a break.

◆ Cosmic Voyage ◆
● From the first stage (Volcanic Planet) to the fifth stage (Blissdream Planet), each stage has a designated initial weapon. In the final stage (Eternal Black Hole), you can choose your own initial weapon.
● Starting from the fourth stage (Miniature Planet), Trailblazers can choose different Adventure Strategies at the start of each phase within the stage, bringing you more Stage Buffs.
● In the final stage (Eternal Black Hole), after the completion of three regular phases, there is an additional challenge phase where Trailblazers can challenge a formidable foe to earn higher points.

◆ Raccoon Tokens ◆
● Defeat enemies in the stages to earn Raccoon Tokens.
● Cosmic Treasures will be dropped by the stages' elite waves and provide random amounts of Weapons/Accessories and Raccoon Tokens.
● After completing each level's challenges, you can spend Raccoon Tokens at the Cosmic Store to enhance your stats, strengthen your weapons, and purchase various gameplay features.

◆ Event Rewards ◆
● During the event, reach a designated amount of points within the stages to redeem stage rewards in the Journey Rewards section.
● Complete stage challenges to earn Cosmic Reputation, which increases your Reputation Rank and allows you to claim corresponding rewards.

50012.Name: Clockie: Dreamjoy Memoir
50012.Description: Clock Studios, the production company behind the "Clockie" animation series, is facing a crisis. But the film's director is nowhere to be found...
50012.Introduction: ◆ Introduction ◆ Due to the disappearance of the Watchmaker, Clock Studios is facing a production crisis. Quickly help them complete the editing work of the Clockie blockbuster Dreamjoy Memoir! ◆ Event Rules ◆ ● Complete the Adventure Mission "Stopped Clock" to start editing the film Dreamjoy Memoir. ● Pushing the editing progress will help earn sponsorship. Upon reaching 100%, you can hold a premiere event to revive the theme park. The sponsorship obtained after a successful screening will be used to repair the damaged screens in the theme park. ● As the film editing progresses, the crew will also get opportunities to shoot "Commercials." Complete Commercial Missions to earn rewards. ● Push the editing progress of Dreamjoy Memoir to unlock more Commercials. ◆ Film Editing ◆ ● The crux of film editing lies in the ability to use Time Dice wisely. Allocating Time Dice to different tropes will result in more shots in the corresponding tropes and different audience reactions, thus bringing changes to the thrilling, comedic, and dramatic emotions of the film. These three Audience Emotions are crucial to the success of the film. ● Before completion, the film will undergo an internal screening, and different films have varying screening criteria. Only when specific requirements are met can the film be deemed passable during the internal screening. ● Any film that fails to meet the criteria during the internal screening stage will be deemed an editing failure. Additionally, if any of the three Audience Emotions for the film reaches 0, the film's content will be deemed problematic, which also counts as an editing failure. ◆ Extra Story ◆ ● During the film's editing process, successful completion of the film editing will earn you the film reel of supporting characters' extra stories. Successfully shooting story snippets that contain previews for extra stories will unlock the corresponding extra stories' film and help animators throughout the cinema complete the stories of the supporting characters! ◆ Regular Rewards ◆ ● During editing, there are also opportunities to try different plot developments, which may result in completely different endings from the original storyline. Complete different endings to earn corresponding rewards in Clockie Paycheck.

50013.Name: All About Boothill...
50013.Description: Geed, a Department of Implement Arts researcher, was looking everywhere for you in the space station and had something to ask. She revealed confidential information having to do with a certain rowdy "interstellar cowboy"...
50013.Introduction:
◆ Introduction ◆
● The researchers at the space station have brought in several assignments from the IPC and handed them over to you. It seems that all of this is related to a certain rambunctious "interstellar cowboy"...

◆ Event Rules ◆
● When the event begins, <unbreak>24</unbreak> assignments will be released. Up to 4 assignments can be accepted at a time.
● Each assignment requires at least two characters to complete. Assignments will be given ratings in the following descending order: S, A, or B. Using recommended Paths or higher-level characters can increase the assignment's rating and earn bonus rewards.
● Event Assignments do not count toward the limit for the Regular Assignments, nor do they occupy characters from Regular Assignments. You can assign 1 Support Character provided by your friends to each Event Assignment.

◆ Event Rewards ◆
● During the event, Trailblazers can obtain rewards by assigning characters to complete the Event Assignments.

50014.Name: Origami Bird Clash
50014.Description: Lookie here! An invitation to beta test Origami Bird Clash? The sender is The Family, so it shouldn't be a scam, right...?
50014.Introduction:
◆ Introduction ◆
Origami Bird Clash is a collectible arcade battle game developed by The Family, featuring a simple Match-Three gameplay to bring you the purest enjoyment. We cordially invite you to participate in a playtesting session for this ongoing project.

◆ Event Rules ◆
● In the Origami Bird Clash event, Trailblazers need to locate arcade machines distributed by the developers in various locations of Penacony and return to the arena at {TEXTJOIN#87} to engage in Match-Three battles with other participants.
● During battles, Trailblazers must feed their Origami Birds by matching fruits to increase their combat power, aiming for victory in the ultimate clash.
● Throughout the elimination process, feeding the Origami Birds their preferred fruits or strategically using special mechanisms on the field can boost your progress.
● After completing the basic Arcade Challenges, Multiplayer Bonanza will be unlocked. Trailblazers can compete in multiplayer battles against other Trailblazers from different worlds to determine the strongest in the clash.

● Additionally, the Open Challenge will be available, allowing Trailblazers to engage in more thrilling duels with their companions.

◆ Permanent Rewards ◆
● Rewards are obtained upon successfully clearing a challenge stage for the first time.

◆ Limited-Time Rewards ◆
● During the limited-time event, specific battle objectives can be completed to earn corresponding rewards.

◆ Event Note ◆
● After the conclusion of the Origami Bird Clash limited-time event, Trailblazers will no longer be able to obtain the event's limited-time rewards or engage in multiplayer battles with Trailblazers from other worlds. However, Trailblazers can still visit the Origami Bird Arcade at {TEXTJOIN#87} to experience the game and obtain permanent rewards.

50015.Name: Saga of Primaveral Blade
50015.Description: The Wardance ceremony is approaching, and March 7th has been invited to become Yanqing and Yunli's apprentice in swordplay. As her assistant, you will plan Swordplay Sessions to help her achieve victory in the eventual duel with swordplay.
50015.Introduction:
◆ Introduction ◆
In Saga of Primaveral Blade, as the swordplay assistant, you will be arranging March 7th's Swordplay Sessions and helping her with comprehending Sword Moves to prepare her to defeat Skott in <unbreak>15</unbreak> days.

◆ Event Rules ◆
● You can schedule up to 4 sessions for March 7th each day, increasing stats through basic training to build a solid foundation for learning Sword Moves.
● By mastering stronger Sword Moves, continuously push March 7th to breakthroughs, aiming directly for Bladecore Genesis.
● There are multiple Swordart Escapade stories in the event, which can be completed through experiencing different Xianzhou Escapades, Companion Assists, and Swordart Anecdotes. In different Swordart Escapades, there are even different ways to complete the story.

◆ Regular Rewards ◆
● Upon completing each different story ending, you can claim collection rewards. Additionally, after accumulating a certain number of story endings, you can also obtain the Eidolon-unlocking items meant for March 7's Path of The Hunt.

◆ Limited-time Rewards ◆
● During the limited-time event, completing specified Sword Training missions will earn you corresponding rewards. The Limited-Time Rewards will no longer be available after the Limited-Time Event has concluded.

50016.Name: Stellar Shimmer
50016.Description: Researcher Grumpy from the space station, along with her new partner, is working on a mysterious test. She earnestly invites you to come and lend a hand...
50016.Introduction:
◆ Introduction ◆
Researcher Grumpy from the space station is hosting a mysterious test. This time she has found you with her partner, hoping you can lend a hand...

◆ Event Rules ◆
● After the event begins, a new challenge stage will open daily, totaling 8 stages.
● Each challenge stage has 2 difficulty levels: Dwarf Star and Supergiant Star. Completing the Dwarf Star challenge unlocks the Supergiant Star difficulty.
● Each challenge stage features a fixed stage mechanism that provides buff effects to characters.
● In the Supergiant Star difficulty, defeating all 6 waves of enemies before the end of the Cycle will earn a Perfect Win rating.
● As Trailblazers increase their Equilibrium Level, enemy strength will increase accordingly.
● Trailblazers can choose trial characters to participate in the challenge.
● Energy regenerated by allies when defeating enemy targets is <unbreak>50%</unbreak> in the Stellar Shimmer event compared to regular battles.

◆ Event Rewards ◆
● During the event period, rewards can be claimed via Limited-Time Rewards upon achieving specific challenge goals within the stages.

50017.Name: Operation Memoria Snapshot
50017.Description: A trainee doctor from Penacony is looking for a helper at Starskiff Haven to help him complete a special photoshoot plan.
50017.Introduction:
◆ Introduction ◆
A trainee doctor from Penacony is looking for a helper at Starskiff Haven to help him complete a special photoshoot plan.

◆ Event Rules ◆
● When the event begins, a new stage will be unlocked every following day, for a total of 6 stages.
● Complete the shoots for the previous stages to unlock the stages that follow.
● When the camera's focus overlaps with the photo subject, take a picture to successfully complete the assignment.
● Photo subjects are separated into Bronze, Silver, and Gold quality Trashcans, and each trashcan offers a different score.
● When Gold Trashcans perform "Special Actions" while you're shooting them, you can also get a bonus "Capture Score."

◆ Event Rewards ◆
● During the event period, obtain trophies from every stage to obtain rewards via Limited-Time Rewards.

50018.Name: Luminary Wardance
50018.Description: The Luminary Wardance opens with great fanfare on the Luofu's Skysplitter, and martial elites from across the cosmos gather to try their mettle against one another. You, too, will experience this supreme martial competition and begin a legendary journey...
50018.Introduction:
◆ Introduction ◆
The Luminary Wardance opens with great fanfare on the Luofu's Skysplitter, and martial elites from across the cosmos gather to try their mettle against one another. You, too, will experience this event with a special role...

◆ Event Rules ◆
● In the event, the Trailblazer will be attending as the coach for Contestant Luka, a representative from Belobog, and participate in the Luminary Wardance matches.
● There are several stages to the tournament. Defeat each Faceoff Match's ringmaster to progress to the next stage and fight in the final "Ringmaster's Challenge," where the defending ringmaster Yanqing awaits.
● Before challenging the ringmaster for each stage, one must defeat other contestants in Knockout Matches to accumulate enough points, after which the qualification to challenge the Faceoff Match's ringmaster will be granted.

◆ Combat Rules ◆
● In the Wardance competitions, both competitors will accumulate "Vibes" based on audience support.
● Each match features different "Highlights" mechanisms, where competitors need to perform specific battle actions to trigger "Highlights" and accumulate ally "Vibes."
● When the opponent's avatar in the Action Order flashes with a red warning, their actions will accumulate "Vibes."
● As ally "Vibes" increase, the opponent "Vibes" will decrease, and vice versa.
● When either competitor's "Vibes" reach the maximum, the battlefield will enter a "Super Hype" state, granting a powerful boost to the side with audience support.
● The Trailblazer, as Luka's coach, can actively use "Tactical Codex" during battle to support Luka or equip "Tactical Beverages" before battle to provide Luka with combat boosts.
● The Trailblazer can choose to use a trial character to participate in the challenge.
● When the Trailblazer raises the Equilibrium Level, the enemy's strength will also increase accordingly.

◆ Knockout Match ◆
● Participate in Knockout Matches to defeat other competitors and earn points. Once you reach the required points, you can challenge the current "Faceoff Match" ringmaster.
● Each stage's Knockout Match features 2 selectable competitors, but you can only challenge one at a time.
● After reaching the required points, you need to visit the lobby's leaderboard to confirm your eligibility to challenge the ringmaster in the Faceoff Match before participating in that stage's match.

◆ Special Invitational Match ◆
● Certain stages feature special invitational matches that can be selected. Participating in special invitational matches will not grant any Knockout Match points.
● When challenging special invitational matches, the Knockout Matches can be participated as normal.

◆ Dreamscape Training ◆
● In Dreamscape Training, you can challenge high-difficulty ringmasters, with a total of 5 levels.
● After completing each stage's Faceoff Match, a new Dreamscape Training stage will be unlocked.
● In Dreamscape Training battles, the bosses of the 3 phases will need to be defeated in 6 Cycles.
● At the end of a challenge, if there are any remaining cycles, you can earn a higher rating.
● In Dreamscape Training battles, ally actions will not accumulate Vibes.
● Complete Dreamscape Training challenge goals to earn Training Rewards.

◆ Regular Rewards ◆
● Complete Faceoff and Knockout Matches to earn Wardance Sword Badge.
● In Wardance Plaudit, Wardance Sword Badge can be exchanged for rewards.
● The pet Tuskpir and the Eidolon-unlocking items for "March 7th: The Hunt" can be obtained from Wardance Plaudit.

◆ Limited-time Rewards ◆
● During the limited-time event, completing specified missions will earn you corresponding rewards.

◆ Event Reminders ◆
● After the Luminary Wardance limited-time event ends, Trailblazers will no longer be able to obtain the limited-time rewards, but they can still visit the Tactics Board in the Skysplitter map to experience and obtain permanent rewards.

50020.Name: Trailblaze: Friendship Is Magic!
50020.Description: The gray friend you once met in dreams has come alone to the real world of Belobog. He has arrived to resolve a crisis involving unknown shadows attacking residents, but he urgently needs your help and that of your companions...
50020.Introduction:
◆ Introduction ◆
The gray friend you once met in dreams has come alone to the real world of Belobog. He has arrived to resolve a crisis involving unknown shadows attacking residents, but he urgently needs your help and that of your companions...

◆ Event Rules ◆
● After the event starts, there will be a new trial stage daily, up to 5 stages.
● Each challenge stage has two difficult levels: Initiation Trial and Official Trial. After completing the Initiation Trials, the Official Trial difficulty level will be unlocked.
● In this trial, Trailblazers can only use designated trial characters or the same characters that Trailblazers have obtained to participate.
● Increasing the Equilibrium Level will also increase enemy levels.

◆ Gameplay ◆
● In each trial phase, different characters will play the role of the Magician, summoning Minicans with different abilities to fight side by side.
● The Magician's Skill and Ultimate will have entirely new battle effects, commanding the Minicans in combat.
● Minicans possess new Attack and Talent abilities, offering diverse combat experiences.
● In the Official Trial difficulty, completing specified combo skill objectives and defeating designated waves of enemies before the Cycle ends will earn evaluations for Star Rewards.

◆ Event Rewards ◆
● During the event period, rewards can be claimed via Bucket Rewards upon achieving specific challenge goals within the stages.

50021.Name: Festive Revelry
50021.Description: The Luofu Temple Fair is currently taking place aboard the Skysplitter. Classic Xianzhou immersias, which were once only available offline, can now be experienced all in one place at the fair.
50021.Introduction:
◆ Summary ◆
The Luofu Temple Fair is currently taking place aboard the Skysplitter. Classic Xianzhou games, which were once only available offline, can now be experienced all in one place at the fair. What are you still waiting for? Register at the Realm-Keeping Commission with Zhaoxia, now!

◆ Event Rules ◆
● The event features 4 game modes, each containing 6 stages.
● Each game mode is divided into Easy Mode and Hard Mode. Completing Easy Mode will unlock Hard Mode. Each game mode includes 3 Easy Mode stages and 3 Hard Mode stages.
● Once the event starts, the Easy Mode stage of Hexanexus will be available. Completing this stage will unlock the next stage in sequence.

◆ Event Rewards ◆
● Complete specific stages during the limited-time event to claim event rewards from "Limited-Time Rewards."

◆ Event Hint ◆
● After the "Festive Revelry" limited-time event has concluded, Trailblazers will no longer be able to obtain the limited-time event rewards. However, they can still go to Zhaoxia to experience the event's content and earn regular rewards.

50022.Name: Sound Hunt Ninjutsu Inscription
50022.Description: The grand music festival hides a lurking threat as the Dazzling Ninja Hero takes the stage — let the hunt begin once more! The band performance will soon commence, and it promises to be an electrifying spectacle!
50022.Introduction:
◆ Introduction ◆
● The grand music festival hides a lurking threat as the Dazzling Ninja Hero takes the stage — let the Sound Hunt begin once more! The band performance will soon commence, and it promises to be an electrifying spectacle!

◆ Event Rules ◆
● In the Sound Hunt Ninjutsu Inscription, Trailblazers will take on the role of the band manager for a music party, leading the members to complete three performances on the central stage of the campus. During preparations, Trailblazers must complete various music challenges to gather Inspiration for composing.
● Once you've gathered enough Inspiration and completed the composition, you can edit the track that will be performed and take the stage. The edited track will also continue to play in the central stage area of Paperfold University.

◆ Regular Rewards ◆
● Complete Easy or Hard music challenges to obtain Commemorative Badges.
● In Performance Remuneration, submit the Commemorative Badges to increase popularity and obtain rewards.

◆ Limited-time Rewards ◆
● During the limited-time event, complete the mission "Sound Hunt: Initiation" to obtain the Light Cone reward and collect musical inspirations to obtain Superimposition material rewards.
During the limited-time event, completing specified missions will earn you corresponding rewards.

◆ Event Reminders ◆
● After the Sound Hunt Ninjutsu Inscription limited-time event ends, Trailblazers will no longer be able to obtain the limited-time rewards, but they can still visit the Center Stage in the Penacony Paperfold University College map to experience and obtain regular rewards.

50024.Name: Cosmic Home Décor Guide
50024.Description: The daily life of the Nameless is not just about majestic trailblazing. It also involves the humdrum of ordinary chores. That being said, how is constructing your own room and developing your own life not a kind of "Trailblazing"?
50024.Introduction:
◆ Overview ◆
The daily life of the Nameless is not just about majestic trailblazing. It also involves the humdrum of ordinary chores. That being said, how is constructing your own room and developing your own life not a kind of "Trailblaze"?

◆ Event Rules ◆
● During the event, the Trailblazer obtains their own room and gradually enriches the room through renovation and furnishing.
● Renovating the room needs to spend Express Fund and the Trailblazer needs to conduct duties to earn these Funds.
● The "Dinner Meeting" segment during "duties" can grant additional Express Fund by reporting the results of this round of duties.

◆ Room Construction ◆
● There are 6 areas in the room, and each area has its independent construction progress.
● Consume Express Funds to complete room construction and increase Décor Rating to obtain rewards.
