● You will obtain Blueprints and Decorations during Dinner Meeting. Blueprints can unlock additional furniture to be built, and Decorations can be placed in different places in the room.

◆ Duties ◆
● Five members will make up a Duty Team to earn Express Funds.
● Select different actions and trigger more lucky events during duty can earn more Express Funds.
● More members can be unlocked as more duties are conducted.

◆ Dinner Meeting ◆
● You will enter the Dinner Meeting phase periodically during duty.
● During the Dinner Meeting, deliver duty report to Pom-Pom and improve the Pom-Pom's evaluation to earn extra Express Fund.

◆ Regular Rewards ◆
● Complete Room Construction to obtain Renovation Subsidy rewards.
● Participate in duty enough times in the Duty Roster to obtain rewards.

◆ Limited-time Rewards ◆
● During the limited-time event, completing specified missions will earn you corresponding rewards and the 4-star character of your choice.

◆ Event Reminders ◆
● After the Cosmic Home Décor Guide limited-time event ends, Trailblazers will no longer be able to obtain the limited-time rewards, but they can still visit the Party Car to experience and obtain permanent rewards.

50025.Name: Between the Frames...
50025.Description: The online Photography Exhibition hosted by the Charmony Academy has officially opened! March 7th is eager to give it a try after hearing that Mr. Reca has been invited to provide remote mentoring... Head to the venue and lend her a hand!
50025.Introduction:
◆ Introduction ◆
The online Photography Exhibition, co-hosted by Mr. Reca and the Charmony Academy, has officially opened! Assist March 7th in showcasing her work and compete together for the final prize!

◆ Event Rules ◆
During the event, a photography theme will be revealed each day. The Trailblazer and March 7th need to gather inspiration based on the daily theme and take corresponding photos.
After successfully shooting and uploading their work, they will receive feedback from Mr. Reca and the viewers.

◆ Event Rewards ◆
● Participate in the photo exhibition. Complete the photoshoot and upload the work to obtain rewards.

50026.Name: Hypogeum Enigma
50026.Description: Accompanied by the explorer, Damionis, you enter the underground palace. Countless rooms sprawl out before you...
50026.Introduction:
◆ Introduction ◆
After Nikador's defeat, the roads around Okhema's have become much safer. It's said that the adventurer, Damionis, is working on a plan to make a fortune... It seems that he had forgotten to invite the hero, in other words, you?

◆ Event Rules ◆
● There are 4 gameplay modes in this event, totaling <unbreak>20</unbreak> stages.
● Each gameplay mode is divided into two difficulties — Shallow Hypogeum and Deep Hypogeum. After completing Shallow Hypogeum, corresponding Deep Hypogeum will be unlocked. The game modes Prophecy Tablet and Golden Scapegoat include 3 Shallow Hypogeum rooms and 3 Deep Hypogeum rooms. The game modes Hand of Zagreus and Oronyx's Miracle include 2 Shallow Hypogeum rooms and 2 Deep Hypogeum rooms.
● After the event is activated, the Shallow Hypogeum room for Prophecy Tablet will be unlocked. Unlock the next room by breaking the seal on the current one, and so on and so forth.

◆ Event Rewards ◆
● Complete specific stages during the limited-time event to claim event rewards from "Limited-Time Rewards."

◆ Event Hint ◆
● After the "Hypogeum Enigma" limited-time event has concluded, Trailblazers will no longer be able to obtain the limited-time event rewards. However, they can still go to Damionis to experience the event's content and earn regular rewards.

50032.Name: Cosmic Lucky Prize
50032.Introduction:
◆ Event Participation Rules ◆
● The event is divided into 7 phases, with a new phase of the prize draw being released each day starting from the 1st day of the event.
● Trailblazers can choose to participate in the prize draw or directly claim a fixed reward of <unbreak>100</unbreak> Stellar Jades before the deadline of each phase (specific times are shown on the event interface). Only one option can be selected. Different options can be picked for each phase.
● If no action is taken during the prize draw period, the default reward of fixed Stellar Jades will be granted, and the prize draw will not be participated in. After the event begins, aside from the prize draw or fixed rewards, you can also directly claim a reward of <unbreak>100</unbreak> Stellar Jades as a Lucky Blessing. If Trailblazers do not log in during the prize draw period, they can still log in before the event ends to claim a one-time reward of <unbreak>800</unbreak> Stellar Jades.
● Each phase's prize draw results will be announced the following day, with specific times displayed on the event interface.
● Trailblazers need to claim their rewards on the event page during the event.
● If you earn a reward but do not claim it during the event, you will not be able to receive it after the event ends, and it will not be reissued.
The "Astral Express" and the "Nameless" servers share one prize pool. Across the seven phases of the event, <unbreak>20</unbreak> Trailblazers can become Lucky Superstars.

◆ Prize Draw Reward ◆
● Lucky Superstar: <unbreak>500</unbreak>,<unbreak>000</unbreak> Stellar Jades
● First Prize: <unbreak>600</unbreak> Stellar Jades
● Second Prize: <unbreak>50</unbreak> Stellar Jades

◆ Winning Rules ◆
● In phases 1, 2, and 3, there will be 2 Trailblazers per phase who have a chance to become the Lucky Superstar. In phases 4, 5, and 6, there will be 3 Trailblazers per phase who have a chance to become the Lucky Superstar. In phase 7, 5 Trailblazers will have a chance to become the Lucky Superstar.
● In each phase's prize draw, if a Trailblazer participates but does not become the Lucky Superstar, there will be a <unbreak>10%</unbreak> chance to win the First Prize and a <unbreak>90%</unbreak> chance to win the Second Prize.
● In each phase, Trailblazers can only win one of the following: Lucky Superstar, First Prize, or Second Prize. The rewards cannot overlap.
● Across all 7 phases, a Trailblazer can only become the Lucky Superstar once. The same Trailblazer cannot be selected as the Lucky Superstar multiple times.

◆ Lucky Superstar Rules Reminder ◆
● If you have violated the HoYoverse Terms of Service while using HoYoverse's services, you will automatically forfeit your eligibility to win the Lucky Superstar prize.
● Participation in this event must comply with relevant laws.
If you are a minor, you need to obtain your guardian's consent before participating in this prize draw event.
● If you win the Lucky Superstar prize, HoYoverse may collect your personal identification information.
● Matters not covered in this event, as well as subsequent player actions, will remain subject to the Honkai: Star Rail Game Terms of Service you have confirmed.

50034.Name: The Awooo Firm
50034.Description: Chimeras bred in the Garden of Life are actually fantastic helpers for the people in Okhema? Step up as their caretaker and tackle the challenges that come your way to assist those in need!
50034.Introduction:
◆ Introduction ◆
● Chimeras bred in the Garden of Life are actually fantastic helpers for the people in Okhema? Step up as their caretaker and tackle the challenges that come your way to assist those in need!

◆ Event Rules ◆
● In The Awooo Firm, Trailblazers will become a chimera administrator. Through assigning suitable chimeras to tasks and adjusting the team composition based on their traits, increase the chimera squad's ranking in the Garden.

◆ Overtime Mode ◆
● After completing the event mission, Overtime Mode will be unlocked at the Garden
● In Overtime Mode, Trailblazer's chimera squad will need to complete multiple rounds of work. After each round of work, you will return to the lineup interface. At this time, the previous round's surviving chimeras' stats will be carried forward, and chimeras that collapsed will not be able to enter the next round.
● Before all the chimeras "collapse from exhaustion," find a way to obtain more Awoo Cookie.

◆ Permanent Rewards ◆
● Rewards are obtained upon increasing chimera squad's ranking.

◆ Limited-time Rewards ◆
● During the limited-time event, completing specified missions will earn you corresponding rewards and a 4-star character of your choice.

◆ Event Reminders ◆
● After The Awooo Firm limited-time event ends, Trailblazers will no longer be able to obtain the limited-time rewards, but they can still visit the Garden of Life map to experience and obtain permanent rewards.

60001.Name: Simulated Universe
60001.Description: Pass each Simulated Universe world for the first time and unlock new Blessings and Curios in the Index to earn Stellar Jade rewards
60001.Introduction:
◆ Gameplay Rules ◆
I, Herta, hereby explain the rules of the Simulated Universe.
● As you fight your way through the Simulated Universe, you may encounter powerful Blessings from different Paths, random Occurrences, or special Curios.
● In the Simulated Universe game mode, you can experience randomly-generated maze combinations, enhanced Elite Enemies, and boss enemies.

◆ Gameplay Rewards ◆
● There are currently multiple worlds in the Simulated Universe. New worlds will be gradually unlocked as you progress through the Simulated Universe and Trailblaze Missions, providing new stages, content, and rewards.
● Clearing every world in the Simulated Universe for the first time will grant rewards, including the 4-star character Herta (Erudition: Ice), Stellar Jades, and Star Rail Passes.
● Complete the Simulated Universe to receive points and get rewards by accumulating points. The Point Rewards will be reset every Monday at <unbreak>04</unbreak>:<unbreak>00</unbreak> (server time).
● Unlock Blessings and Curios in the Simulated Universe Index to receive Stellar Jades.
● Defeating an enemy in Simulated Universe's "Domain — Elite" or "Domain — Boss" will earn extra drops.
● Complete the Simulated Universe to receive Ability Points. These are used in the Ability Tree to activate powerful abilities and aid in your exploration of the Simulated Universe.
● Starting from Simulated Universe — World 3, Planar Ornament exchange will be available after you defeat Elite or Boss enemies.

60003.Name: Simulated Universe:\nSwarm Disaster
60003.Introduction:
◆ Introduction ◆
● Herta, Ruan Mei, Screwllum, and Stephen have joined forces to bring about the Simulated Universe's first major update!
They're not only bringing in brand-new Blessings, Curios, and random Occurrences, but also the new Audience Journey map and the mysterious Audience Dice and Communing Device!

◆ Gameplay Goal ◆
In Simulated Universe: Swarm Disaster game mode, Trailblazers need to conduct Trail of Pathstrider challenges, raise Communing Trail points, and ultimately unlock all main story chapters.

◆ Gameplay Content ◆
● Audience Journey: Travel and plot your route across a "map" formed of various domains to arrive at your destination.
● Audience Dice: Use the Communing Device to toss out Audience Dice. Each Path's Audience Die offers varied effects. Using these effects optimally will allow you to gain more Blessings and Curios.
● Communing Trail: Increasing your Communing Trail points can let you unlock various special buffs (Note: The buffs are only active in Simulated Universe: Swarm Disaster).
● Swarm: True Sting — In the depths of the third plane, you can challenge the new boss Swarm: True Sting.
● Additionally, Simulated Universe: Swarm Disaster has been updated with a huge number of new Blessings, Curios, and random Occurrences, while also welcoming brand-new Path Resonances.

◆ Gameplay Rewards ◆
● Collect all the Swarm Disaster chapters to earn chapter collection rewards.
● Complete Trail of Pathstrider to get the corresponding rewards.
● Clearing each difficulty for the first time will earn you first-time completion rewards.

◆ Attention ◆
● Simulated Universe: Swarm Disaster has 5 difficulties in total, with Difficulty V offering high-level obstacles and challenges. Trailblazers can challenge these difficulties based on their preferences.
● Collect all chapters of Swarm Disaster and complete the Adventure Mission Swarm Disaster: The End to unlock the all-new Path of Propagation in Simulated Universe.

60004.Name: Simulated Universe
60004.Description: In the Immersion Device of Simulated Universe: World 7, Trailblazers can exchange for Planar Ornaments Rutilant Arena and Broken Keel
60004.Introduction:
◆ Gameplay Rules ◆
I, Herta, hereby explain the rules of the Simulated Universe.
● As you fight your way through the Simulated Universe, you may encounter powerful Blessings from different Paths, random Occurrences, or special Curios.
● In the Simulated Universe game mode, you can experience randomly-generated maze combinations, enhanced Elite Enemies, and boss enemies.

◆ Gameplay Rewards ◆
● There are currently multiple worlds in the Simulated Universe. New worlds will be gradually unlocked as you progress through the Simulated Universe and Trailblaze Missions, providing new stages, content, and rewards.
● Clearing every world in the Simulated Universe for the first time will grant rewards, including the 4-star character Herta (Erudition: Ice), Stellar Jades, and Star Rail Passes.
● Complete the Simulated Universe to receive points and get rewards by accumulating points. The Point Rewards will be reset every Monday at <unbreak>04</unbreak>:<unbreak>00</unbreak> (server time).
● Unlock Blessings and Curios in the Simulated Universe Index to receive Stellar Jades.
● Defeating an enemy in Simulated Universe's "Domain — Elite" or "Domain — Boss" will earn extra drops.
● Complete the Simulated Universe to receive Ability Points. These are used in the Ability Tree to activate powerful abilities and aid in your exploration of the Simulated Universe.
● Starting from Simulated Universe — World 3, Planar Ornament exchange will be available after you defeat Elite or Boss enemies.

60005.Name: Simulated Universe
60005.Description: In the Immersion Device of Simulated Universe: World 8, Trailblazers can exchange for the Planar Ornaments: "Penacony, Land of the Dreams" and "Firmament Frontline: Glamoth"
60005.Introduction:
◆ Gameplay Rules ◆
I, Herta, hereby explain the rules of the Simulated Universe.
● As you fight your way through the Simulated Universe, you may encounter powerful Blessings from different Paths, random Occurrences, or special Curios.
● In the Simulated Universe game mode, you can experience randomly-generated maze combinations, enhanced Elite Enemies, and boss enemies.

◆ Gameplay Rewards ◆
● There are currently multiple worlds in the Simulated Universe. New worlds will be gradually unlocked as you progress through the Simulated Universe and Trailblaze Missions, providing new stages, content, and rewards.
● Clearing every world in the Simulated Universe for the first time will grant rewards, including the 4-star character Herta (Erudition: Ice), Stellar Jades, and Star Rail Passes.
● Complete the Simulated Universe to receive points and get rewards by accumulating points. The Point Rewards will be reset every Monday at <unbreak>04</unbreak>:<unbreak>00</unbreak> (server time).
● Unlock Blessings and Curios in the Simulated Universe Index to receive Stellar Jades.
● Defeating an enemy in Simulated Universe's "Domain — Elite" or "Domain — Boss" will earn extra drops.
● Complete the Simulated Universe to receive Ability Points. These are used in the Ability Tree to activate powerful abilities and aid in your exploration of the Simulated Universe.
● Starting from Simulated Universe — World 3, Planar Ornament exchange will be available after you defeat Elite or Boss enemies.

60006.Name: Planar Infinity
60006.Description:
This time, Herta and three other members of the Genius Society made some, uh, crazy tweaks to the Simulated Universe, but unexpectedly, they messed up a bit — all the codes got scrambled, and the universe started expanding infinitely!
Now it's up to you to fix this insane universe!
60006.Introduction:
◆ Introduction ◆
Herta, Ruan Mei, Screwllum, and Stephen each conducted wild modifications to the Simulated Universe.

◆ Event Rules ◆
● After the event starts, a new plane will be unlocked daily, with a total of 5 planes.
● Each plane has different plane rules that help Trailblazers obtain more Blessings, Curios, and Cosmic Fragments to enhance their power.
● Each plane consists of an Ordinary Plane and a Manic Plane. After clearing the Ordinary Plane, you can enter the Manic Plane.
● The Manic Plane involves multiple consecutive battles with a 6-Cycle countdown. As the level increases, the number of enemies grows. You earn Manic Points based on the challenge level, and if you complete the challenge with cycles remaining, you'll gain extra Manic Points.
● After clearing the Ordinary Plane, data such as the characters, Blessings, Curios, and Cosmic Fragments used will be automatically saved. You can repeatedly challenge the Manic Plane to earn higher Manic Points.
● When the Trailblazer increases their Equilibrium Level, the levels of the enemies and trial characters in the event will also increase accordingly.

◆ Event Rewards ◆
During the event, by clearing the Ordinary Plane in each plane, challenging the Manic Plane, and earning the specified Manic Points, you can claim plane rewards in the "Limited-Time Rewards."
● After reaching the specified target for the highest accumulated Manic Points across all planes, you can claim the cumulative reward.

◆ Attention ◆
● Blessings, Curios, and Occurrences encountered within the plane will not unlock entries in the Simulated Universe index.

60007.Name: Simulated Universe: Gold and Gears
60007.Introduction:
◆ Summary ◆
Herta, Ruan Mei, Screwllum, and Stephen have joined forces to bring about the Simulated Universe's second major update! They're not only bringing in brand-new Blessings, Curios, and random Occurrences, but also introducing all-new Adventure Missions. 

◆ Gameplay Goal ◆
Gather all Trailblaze Secrets in Simulated Universe: Gold and Gears to learn more about the IPC and ultimately unlock all Aeon Secrets.

◆ Gameplay Content ◆
● Custom Dice: The updated version now allows for free assembly and customization of its dice faces. Collect dice faces with various abilities and strategically combine these varied Custom Dice to get more Blessings and Curios.
● Resonance Extrapolation: In the boss fight in the deepest level of the Third Plane, the overflowing Path energy from Erudition will interfere with the Simulated Universe system and extrapolate Path Resonances for different Paths, thereby presenting new challenges for the team.
● Moreover, Simulated Universe: Gold and Gears has updated Blessings, Curios, random Occurrences, and brand-new Path Resonances.

◆ Gameplay Rewards ◆
● Collect "Simulated Universe: Gold and Gears" Secrets to earn collection rewards.
● Complete "Tests" and "Conundrums" to earn challenge rewards.
● Clear each difficulty for the first time to earn the first-time clearance rewards.

◆ Attention ◆
● Simulated Universe: Gold and Gears has 5 difficulties in total, with the fifth one being the most difficult and challenging. Trailblazers can challenge these difficulties based on their preferences.
● Collect all the Secrets in Gold and Gears and complete the Adventure Mission "Gold and Gears: Finale" to unlock the brand-new Path of Erudition inside the Simulated Universe.

60008.Name: Simulated Universe: World 9
60008.Description: In the Immersion Device of Simulated Universe: World 9, Trailblazers can exchange for Planar Ornaments "Izumo Gensei and Takama Divine Realm" and "Sigonia, the Unclaimed Desolation"
60008.Introduction:
◆ Gameplay Rules ◆
I, Herta, hereby explain the rules of the Simulated Universe.
● As you fight your way through the Simulated Universe, you may encounter powerful Blessings from different Paths, random Occurrences, or special Curios.
● In the Simulated Universe game mode, you can experience randomly-generated maze combinations, enhanced Elite Enemies, and boss enemies.

◆ Gameplay Rewards ◆
● There are currently multiple worlds in the Simulated Universe. New worlds will be gradually unlocked as you progress through the Simulated Universe and Trailblaze Missions, providing new stages, content, and rewards.
● Clearing every world in the Simulated Universe for the first time will grant rewards, including the 4-star character Herta (Erudition: Ice), Stellar Jades, and Star Rail Passes.
● Complete the Simulated Universe to receive points and get rewards by accumulating points. The Point Rewards will be reset every Monday at <unbreak>04</unbreak>:<unbreak>00</unbreak> (server time).
● Unlock Blessings and Curios in the Simulated Universe Index to receive Stellar Jades.
● Defeating an enemy in Simulated Universe's "Domain — Elite" or "Domain — Boss" will earn extra drops.
● Complete the Simulated Universe to receive Ability Points. These are used in the Ability Tree to activate powerful abilities and aid in your exploration of the Simulated Universe.
● Starting from Simulated Universe — World 3, Planar Ornament exchange will be available after you defeat Elite or Boss enemies.

60011.Name: Divergent Universe:\nThe Human Comedy
60011.Introduction:
◆ Introduction ◆
With Planet Screwllum's technology as its medium, Screwllum created a completely standalone project branch for the Simulated Universe. He has updated it with new Blessings, Curios, and random Occurrences, and even configured a totally new testing ground, Equations, and Weighted Curios. Who knows, there could be even more hidden surprises within.

◆ Gameplay Goal ◆
● Clear Ordinary Extrapolation and Cyclical Extrapolation to obtain Synchronicity Points and raise the Synchronicity Level to obtain rewards.

◆ Gameplay Rewards ◆
● Collect Blessings, Equations, Occurrences, Curios, and Weighted Curios in the Divergent Universe to obtain collection rewards.
● Clear the various Ordinary Extrapolation difficulties to obtain challenge rewards.
● First-time clearances of Cyclical Extrapolation each week yield bonus rewards.
● Complete specific Stable Computing Array objectives to obtain the corresponding rewards.

◆ Ordinary Extrapolation ◆
● Clear Ordinary Extrapolation to unlock new difficulties. First-time clearances of new difficulties yield bonus rewards.
● After clearing Difficulty 5, a Threshold Protocol system will be added to it.
● After enabling the Threshold Protocol, Ordinary Extrapolation difficulties will be greatly increased. Trailblazers can select and challenge a Protocol level suited to their own circumstances.
● Stages must be cleared in Ordinary Extrapolation to unlock more advanced Threshold Protocols.
● First-time clearances for each Threshold Protocol level yield bonus rewards.

◆ Cyclical Extrapolation ◆
● Special gameplay content is updated in Cyclical Extrapolation every week. First-time clearances every week yield bonus rewards.
● Clear Weekly Extrapolation to earn bonus Synchronicity Points, of which there is a weekly limit. When that limit is reached, clearing Weekly Extrapolation still yields Synchronicity Points.
● In Cyclical Extrapolation, Trailblazers can choose the difficulties and Threshold Protocols that were unlocked in Ordinary Extrapolation.
● Cyclical Extrapolation will be updated every Monday at <unbreak>04</unbreak>:<unbreak>00</unbreak> (Server time).

◆ Arithmetic Mapping ◆
● In the Divergent Universe, character levels, Light Cone levels, Traces, and Relics will be enhanced when the conditions are fulfilled. These enhancements are only effective in the Divergent Universe.
● When a character's level is below the level cap set by the current Equilibrium Level, it will be increased to that level cap.
● When a character's unlocked Traces are inactive, or if their Trace Level is lower than that required by the current Equilibrium Level, their Traces will be activated or their Trace Level will be increased to a level suitable for the current Equilibrium Level.
● When a character's equipped Relics' total Enhancement Level is lower than that required by the current Equilibrium Level, their Relics will be replaced with temporary Relics that are compatible with the current Equilibrium Level.

◆ Synchronicity Level Reward Extension ◆
●The Divergent Universe's Synchronicity Level will be regularly extended to provide new rewards.
● If the Trailblazer's Synchronicity Level reaches the maximum before the Synchronicity Level is extended, they will not be able to obtain Synchronicity Points in the Divergent Universe.

◆ Simulated Universe Points ◆
● Clear Cyclical Extrapolation and Ordinary Extrapolation to obtain Simulated Universe Points.

60016.Name: Simulated Universe: Unknowable Domain
60016.Description: In the Simulated Universe, the geniuses discovered an unobservable area called the Unknowable Domain.
60016.Introduction:
◆ Introduction ◆
A brand-new expansion module: Herta and Screwllum have discovered an unobservable area within the Simulated Universe: Unknowable Domain! Unknown Curios, random Occurrences, and the Scepter system and Components left behind by Rubert II — could the fifth collaborator mentioned by these two geniuses be...?

◆ Gameplay Goal ◆
● Clear the Scattered Archives and Mundanite Assembly to complete the challenge

◆ Gameplay Rewards ◆
● Collect Scepters, Components, Occurrences, and Curios from the "Simulated Universe: Unknowable Domain" to earn collection rewards in the Emulation Records.
● Clearing each stage in the Scattered Archives for the first time will grant challenge rewards.
● Clearing each stage in the Mundanite Assembly for the first time will grant bonus rewards.
● Story snippets collected during the stages can earn you bonus rewards in Trailblaze Secrets.
● Completing the goals of specific Reorganized Models will earn corresponding rewards.

◆ Scattered Archives ◆
● Clearing stages in Scattered Archives unlocks new stages, with bonus rewards granted for the first-time completion of these new stages. Starting from Stage 5, you can access the Fourth Plane for further challenges.
● After clearing Stage 5, a Conundrum Level system will be added to the stage.
● When the Conundrum Level is used, the difficulty of Scattered Archives will significantly increase. Trailblazers can choose an appropriate Conundrum Level based on their abilities for the challenge.
● Higher Conundrum Levels can only be unlocked by clearing Stage 5 of Scattered Archives.
● Additional rewards can be earned for the first-time completion of each Conundrum Level.

◆ Mundanite Assembly ◆
● The Mundanite Assembly offers custom challenges for players to experience, with additional rewards granted upon first-time completion.
● After successfully completing a challenge in the Mundanite Assembly, you can review the recorded Build Content for reference when attempting other stages.
● Successfully completing challenges in the Mundanite Assembly will also unlock new story snippets.

◆ Arithmetic Mapping ◆
● In the Simulated Universe: Unknowable Domain, character levels, Light Cone levels, Traces, and Relics will be enhanced when the conditions are fulfilled. These enhancements are the same as in the Divergent Universe.
● When a character's level is below the level cap set by the current Equilibrium Level, it will be increased to that level cap.
● When a character's unlocked Traces are inactive, or if their Trace Level is lower than that required by the current Equilibrium Level, their Traces will be activated or their Trace Level will be increased to a level suitable for the current Equilibrium Level.
● When a character's equipped Relics' total Enhancement Level is lower than that required by the current Equilibrium Level, their Relics will be replaced with temporary Relics that are compatible with the current Equilibrium Level.

◆ Simulated Universe Points ◆
● Clear Scattered Archives and Mundanite Assembly to obtain weekly Simulated Universe Points.

60017.Name: Divergent Universe: Protean Hero
60017.Introduction:
◆ Overview ◆
Huge Divergent Universe update! Not only are there new Blessings, Equations, Weighted Curios, and random Occurrences, but also new Golden Blood's Boons.

◆ Gameplay Goal ◆
● Clear Ordinary Extrapolation and Cyclical Extrapolation to obtain Synchronicity Points and raise the Synchronicity Level to obtain rewards.

◆ Gameplay Rewards ◆
● Collect Blessings, Equations, Occurrences, Curios, Weighted Curios, and Golden Blood's Boons in the Divergent Universe to obtain collection rewards.
● Clear the various Ordinary Extrapolation difficulties for the first time to obtain challenge rewards.
● First-time clearances of Cyclical Extrapolation each week yield bonus rewards.
● Complete specific Stable Computing Array objectives to obtain the corresponding rewards.

◆ Ordinary Extrapolation ◆
● Pass Ordinary Extrapolation to unlock new difficulties. First-time clearance of a new difficulty grants you bonus rewards.
● After passing the fifth difficulty, the Astronomical Division mode will be unlocked.

◆ Cyclical Extrapolation ◆
● Special gameplay content is updated in Cyclical Extrapolation every week. First-time clearances every week yield bonus rewards.
● Clear Weekly Extrapolation to earn bonus Synchronicity Points, of which there is a weekly limit. When that limit is reached, clearing Weekly Extrapolation still yields Synchronicity Points.
● In Cyclical Extrapolation, Trailblazers can choose the difficulties and Threshold Protocols that were unlocked in Ordinary Extrapolation.
● Cyclical Extrapolation will be updated every Monday at <unbreak>04</unbreak>:<unbreak>00</unbreak> (Server time).

◆ Astronomical Division Mode ◆
● In Astronomical Division Mode, players can challenge Threshold Protocols. The difficulty of the game will be greatly increased while challenging Threshold Protocols.
● Astronomical Division Mode includes Star-Pioneer Mode and Practice Mode.
● In Star-Pioneer Mode, you can light Cognoculi to increase your Astronomical Division. The higher your Astronomical Division, the higher the Threshold Protocol in Star-Pioneer Mode will be.
● Astronomical Division cannot be lowered in Star-Pioneer Mode. Your number of Cognoculi may increase or decrease in the same Astronomical Division. Some Astronomical Divisions contain rank-retaining mechanisms.
● In Practice Mode, you can freely choose Threshold Protocol levels, up to the max level corresponding to your current Astronomical Division.
● Practice Mode will not affect your Astronomical Division or Cognoculi.

◆ Arithmetic Mapping ◆
● In the Divergent Universe, character levels, Light Cone levels, Traces, and Relics will be enhanced when the conditions are fulfilled. These enhancements are only effective in the Divergent Universe.
● When a character's level is below the level cap set by the current Equilibrium Level, it will be increased to that level cap.
● When a character's unlocked Traces are inactive, or if their Trace Level is lower than that required by the current Equilibrium Level, their Traces will be activated or their Trace Level will be increased to a level suitable for the current Equilibrium Level.
● When a character's equipped Relics' total Enhancement Level is lower than that required by the current Equilibrium Level, their Relics will be replaced with temporary Relics that are compatible with the current Equilibrium Level.

◆ Synchronicity Level Reward Extension ◆
●The Divergent Universe's Synchronicity Level will be regularly extended to provide new rewards.
● If the Trailblazer's Synchronicity Level reaches the maximum before the Synchronicity Level is extended, they will not be able to obtain Synchronicity Points in the Divergent Universe.

◆ Simulated Universe Points ◆
● Clear Cyclical Extrapolation and Ordinary Extrapolation to obtain Simulated Universe Points.

80001.Name: Even Immortality Ends
80001.Description: As the Ambrosial Arbor is rejuvenated, the sinister plots on the Luofu are about to emerge to the surface...

80002.Name: Obsequies Performed, A Long Road Ahead
80002.Description: With the banishment of Phantylia, the Xianzhou's crisis has found its respite, but a few stories have yet to find their endings...

80003.Name: Future Market
80003.Description: On the eve of the Solwarm Festival, a messenger from the Interastral Peace Corporation arrived at Belobog...

80004.Name: Clouds Leave No Trace
80004.Description: A letter was delivered to the Express, proposing a reunion of old acquaintances, but the intention was indeterminable...

80005.Name: Crown of the\nMundane and Divine
80005.Description: The mundanity and the genius, humanity and divinity. Sensed during a golden epoch, the struggles across life's years are nothing more than absurd instants...

80006.Name: Long Day's Journey Into Night
80006.Description: A new journey is about to begin in Penacony, the Planet of Festivities — Enjoy your vacation in a gilded dream!

80007.Name: The Devil in Velvet
80007.Description: You witnessed the truth that Aventurine spoke of — the truth that could overturn Penacony. And now, you wonder what kind of a show will play next...

80008.Name: The Fool Always Rings Twice
80008.Description: The secret lying within the shadows of Penacony has already been revealed, yet the countdown to the Charmony Festival continues...

80009.Name: Farewell, Penacony
80009.Description: The trailblazing expedition of Penacony has come to a wonderful conclusion. It's time to stride forward to the next destination — but before moving on, let's bid a formal farewell to the white night behind you.

80010.Name: Finest Duel\nUnder the Pristine Blue (I)
80010.Description: The Xianzhou Luofu's Wardance is about to commence, with guests arriving from different worlds. But those who arrive are not solely interested in beholding the martial traditions...

80011.Name: Finest Duel\nUnder the Pristine Blue (II)
80011.Description: Wolves lurk encircling, and the hunter draws their bow. High above, within the Skysplitter, the Xianzhou Luofu's Wardance ceremony is about to commence a sanguine competition...

80012.Name: Banana Outrage: Battles Without Ninja and Humanity
80012.Description: Laughter, song, and dance linger all day, and by twilight, we sleep and do not wake — this dream world is like an old banana peel, covered in dark stains, how intolerable! Seek the true path, and extinguish this Mappou Age of the Dharma!

80013.Name: A New Venture\non the Eighth Dawn
80013.Description: A sweet dream that never ends, singing once more for the travelers — they return to this place, only to leave again.

80014.Name: Paean of Era Nova
80014.Description: A brand-new journey is about to begin. The next chapter of this epic will be inked with traces of Trailblaze. To discover the prophecy hidden behind the misted dawn, the heroes embarked, seeking the flame.

80015.Name: Long Day's Journey Into Night
80015.Description: The Express is about to arrive at Penacony, the Planet of Festivities — Enjoy your vacation in a gilded dream!

80016.Name: Light Slips the Gate, Shadow Greets the Throne
80016.Description: The homecoming is exiled, and the departing embark on their journey. The world is thus: One generation rises, Another wilts.
